preferences.title: Email
preferences.name: email
preferences.description: Email used for your Feedbin account

preferences.title: Password
preferences.name: password
preferences.description: Password used for your Feedbin account

preferences.title: URL Source
preferences.name: urlSource
preferences.description: Where to get the URL from when marking an article to read later or subscribing to a feed

commands.name: all-feeds
commands.title: View Feeds
commands.description: Shows all feeds in your Feedbin account

commands.name: unread-menu-bar
commands.title: Feedbin Menu Bar
commands.description: Fetches updates every 15 minutes in the background and displays the number of unread entries in the menu bar

preferences.name: showCountInMenuBar
preferences.description: Toggles whether or not the number of unread articles is shown in the menu bar
preferences.label: Show Unread Count

preferences.name: openWhileMarkingAsRead
preferences.description: Toggles whether or not to open an article when marking it as read from the menu bar
preferences.label: Open While Marking as Read

commands.name: starred-entries
commands.title: View Starred Content
commands.description: View a list of your starred entries

commands.name: add-subscription
commands.title: Subscribe to URL
commands.description: Looks for RSS feeds on the given URL. If only one is found it will be subscribed to, but if multiple are found you will be presented with the options to choose from. The source of the URL is based on the extension level URL Source preference and defaults to selected text.

commands.name: read-later
commands.title: Read Later
commands.description: Saves the URL to Feedbin to read later. The source of the URL is based on the extension level URL Source preference and defaults to selected text.
